attributes.action: Review the Road Fund tax to include third party Insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the object of ensuring that every vehicle legally on the road is covered so that victims of accidents can claim compensation for injury and damaged from the Driver.
The annual paper licence to be replaced with number plates which include the licence year. The Licence to run for the  financial year.
Untaxed vehicles could be readily identified. 
The use of illegal typefaces could be halted.
The production of number plates could be part of the rehabilitation programme for the Prison Service. 
Made of light gauge aluminium, returned at the end of the year, recycled and remanufactured.
